Internships & Experience

NIT Patna ‚Äî Summer Intern (Jun 2025 - Jul 2025)

Designed and analyzed internal/external fin structures in PCM using ANSYS for battery thermal management. Achieved ~1.62% reduction in cell temperature by optimizing fins. Worked on meshing and simulation setup.

Certificate

Hitachi Astemo ‚Äî Summer Trainee (May 2025 - Jun 2025)

Analyzed front and rear shock absorber structures, observed assembly/production lines, applied Lean, Six Sigma and Kaizen methodologies for process improvement.

Certificate

SAE-ZHCET Club ‚Äî Solid Modeling & Chassis Design (Jun 2023 - Jul 2023)

Led design & modeling in SolidWorks, focusing on structural integrity and manufacturability. Executive member ‚Äî guided iterative design and prototyping.

Profile

I-STEM Volunteer Ambassador ‚Äî I-STEM Ambassador Program & Volunteering Initiative

I am truly delighted to announce that I have been selected as an I-STEM Volunteer Ambassador under the I-STEM Ambassador Program and Volunteering Initiative, driven by the prestigious Indian Institute of Science (IISc), Bengaluru üèõÔ∏è.

This opportunity empowers me to: ‚úÖ Promote equitable access to R&D infrastructure across India ‚úÖ Lead scientific outreach and community engagement initiatives ‚úÖ Collaborate with leading institutions and innovators ‚úÖ Strengthen India‚Äôs scientific ecosystem through impactful volunteering

I‚Äôll soon be participating in the Ambassador Training Program to learn, engage with experts, and align with the vision of I-STEM.

This program enhances my journey as a changemaker in science and innovation while connecting me with a national platform hosted by IISc Bengaluru.

üôè Heartfelt gratitude to the I-STEM Team and Ms. Sanjana B, Project Analyst (IISc), for trusting me with this opportunity.
